title: test gem3d component model loading and rendering
description: Verify that the Gem3D component correctly downloads 3D GLB model assets using downloadAsync, handles production asset paths, and renders the rotating textured 3D gemstone model without errors.

title: test custom splash screen display and transition
description: Ensure the Custom Splash Screen component displays correctly during app initialization and only hides after fonts and assets are fully loaded, providing a smooth transition to the main app UI.

title: test tab navigation gem model switching
description: Validate that the tab navigation structure allows instant switching between Diamond, Stone, and Opal tabs, each loading and displaying the correct 3D gem model without delay or rendering issues.

title: test app initialization font loading and global configuration
description: Check that the app initialization process correctly loads required fonts, sets up global providers, and applies configuration settings to ensure stable app startup.

title: test asset downloading mechanism for production compatibility
description: Confirm that the asset downloading mechanism converts bundled asset URIs to usable file paths correctly in production builds, preventing file not found errors.

title: test app stability across js engines and minification
description: Verify that the app does not crash or behave unexpectedly due to differences between Hermes and JSC JS engines or due to code minification settings.

title: test opengl context initialization and fallback logic
description: Ensure that the OpenGL context initializes properly and that fallback logic for simplified GLView rendering works correctly to maintain 3D rendering stability.

title: test smooth user experience during 3d rendering
description: Validate that the user experience remains smooth with no visible glitches, memory leaks, or performance degradation during 3D gemstone model rendering and animation.
